text: Ian Michael Kinsler (born June 22, 1982) is a second baseman for the Los Angeles Angels of Major League Baseball. He started playing in the major leagues in 2006 with the Texas Rangers, and he stayed with Texas through the 2013 season. Kinsler played for the Detroit Tigers from 2014â€“2017. He has been an All-Star five times and he won a Gold Glove Award in 2016. ==Other websites== Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Tucson, Arizona Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Texas Rangers players
title: Ian Kinsler
